name: One day in UNIVERSE
description:
Fight space pirates in fierce turn based action combat and escape them with your ship and crew intact.

Controls:

Arrows (you'll be pressing them a lot and quite fast, so be ready)
Spacebar

Numbers/Numpad: set game window scale
F11: toggle fullscreen

Made for #LOWREZJAM 2019 

Music by: Juhani Junkala licensed under CC0, from OpenGameArt.org

(None: You might see debug console..).
